com.example.denis.myapplication

Class CVFaceDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.denis.myapplication.CVFaceDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDetector, IFaceLocator, java.lang.Runnable

    public class CVFaceDetector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, IFaceLocator
    Face detection and landmarks location via OpenCV Detection is being run in it's own thread continuously When any face (nearest one) is detected, it's geometry is cached All get methods return this cache
